subject: Basketball
Wages and Salaries
Taxation
lead_paragraph: The Nets payroll — once they complete a trade for Kevin Garnett and Paul Pierce — will be about $98 million, triggering a tax bill of about $75 million.
snippet: The Nets payroll — once they complete a trade for Kevin Garnett and Paul Pierce — will be about $98 million, triggering a tax bill of about $75 million.
